_header: Through grace growing in God almight
_description: ‘In One is All’, a song of the Trinity — seven eight-line stanzas

BLHar1022.First Lines: Thurgh grace growand in god almyghty mekle maked for to springeA song ful soth & ful of lyght our conscience consels for to syng…
BLHar1022.Last Lines: …he bring vs vnto hys blysse & hery vs hye in to hys halleþo hole trinite be graunt þisse & alle þat trowes In one is alle
